text: John Leonard Marriott (1 April 1928 – 9 February 2016) was an English professional footballer who made more than 400 appearances in the Football League playing as an outside right for Sheffield Wednesday, Huddersfield Town and Scunthorpe United. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Scunthorpe Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Midland Football League players Category:English Football League players
title: Jackie Marriott
